ai-mn113:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-mn113:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the teaching of the good persons and the teaching of the bad persons.
ai-mn113:2.2_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-mn113:3.1_0: “And what is a quality of a bad person?
ai-mn113:3.2_0: It’s when a bad person has gone forth from an eminent family.
ai-mn113:3.4_0: ‘I have gone forth from an eminent family, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:3.5_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:3.6_0: This is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:3.8_0: ‘It’s not because of one’s eminent family that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:3.9_0: Even if someone has not gone forth from an eminent family,
ai-mn113:3.10_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:3.11_0: Keping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their extremely wealthy family.
ai-mn113:3.12_0: This is the teaching of the good persons.
ai-mn113:4-6.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who has gone forth from a great family ...
ai-mn113:4-6.5_0: ‘I have gone forth from an extremely wealthy family, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:4-6.6_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:4-6.7_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:4-6.9_0: ‘It’s not because of one’s wealth that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:4-6.10_0: Even if someone has not gone forth from an extremely wealthy family,
ai-mn113:4-6.11_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:4-6.12_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their extremely wealthy family.
ai-mn113:4-6.13_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:7.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who is well-known and famous.
ai-mn113:7.3_0: ‘I’m well-known and famous. These other mendicants are few, but I haven’t looked after them.’
ai-mn113:7.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:7.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:7.7_0: ‘It’s not because of one’s fame that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:7.8_0: Even if someone is not well-known and famous,
ai-mn113:7.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:7.10_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their fame.
ai-mn113:7.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:8.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who receives robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-mn113:8.3_0: ‘I receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:8.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:8.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:8.7_0: ‘It’s not because of one’s material possessions that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:8.8_0: Even if someone doesn’t receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick,
ai-mn113:8.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:8.10_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their material possessions.
ai-mn113:8.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:9.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who is very learned ...
ai-mn113:9.3_0: ‘I’m very learned, but I’m not learned.’
ai-mn113:9.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:9.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:9.7_0: ‘It’s not because of anger that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:9.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:9.10_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their material possessions.
ai-mn113:9.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:10.1_0: who is an expert in the texts on monastic training ...
ai-mn113:10.3_0: ‘I’m an expert in the training, but these other mendicants are not the others.’
ai-mn113:10.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:10.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:10.7_0: ‘It’s not because of one’s training that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:10.8_0: Even if you don’t become an expert in the training,
ai-mn113:10.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:10.10_0: Keping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their extra effort.
ai-mn113:10.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:11.3_0: ‘I’m an expert in the Teaching, while these other mendicants are not Dhamma.’
ai-mn113:11.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:11.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:11.7_0: ‘It’s not because of the teaching that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:11.8_0: Even if someone is not a Dhamma speaker,
ai-mn113:11.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:11.10_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their material possessions.
ai-mn113:11.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:12.3_0: ‘I stay in the wilderness, and I’m not staying in the wilderness.’
ai-mn113:12.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:12.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:12.7_0: ‘It’s not because of one’s self that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:12.8_0: Even if he doesn’t stay in the wilderness,
ai-mn113:12.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:12.10_0: Keping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their material possessions.
ai-mn113:12.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:13.3_0: ‘I wear these other mendicants rag-robes, but these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:13.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:13.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:13.7_0: ‘It’s not because of eating rag robes that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:13.8_0: Even if someone doesn’t wear rag robes,
ai-mn113:13.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:13.10_0: Keping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their eating it.
ai-mn113:13.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:14.3_0: ‘I’m alms-food; these other mendicants don’t eat only almsfood.’
ai-mn113:14.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:14.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:14.7_0: ‘It’s not because of eating alms-food that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:14.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:14.10_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their alms.
ai-mn113:14.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:15.1_0: who stays at the root of a tree ...
ai-mn113:15.3_0: ‘I’m at the root of a tree, but these other mendicants are not others.’
ai-mn113:15.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:15.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:15.7_0: ‘It’s not because of eating tree that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:15.8_0: Even if you don’t stay at the root of a tree,
ai-mn113:15.9_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:15.10_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their fame.
ai-mn113:15.11_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:16-20.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who is a shelter ...
ai-mn113:16-20.2_0: who stays in the open air ...
ai-mn113:16-20.4_0: who sleeps wherever they lay their mat ...
ai-mn113:16-20.5_0: who eats in one sitting per day.
ai-mn113:16-20.7_0: ‘I’m an expert in one sitting per day. These other mendicants are not looking after myself.’
ai-mn113:16-20.8_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:16-20.9_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:16-20.11_0: ‘It’s not because of eating in one sitting per day that thoughts of greed, hate, or delusion come to an end.
ai-mn113:16-20.12_0: Even if someone eats in more than one sitting per day,
ai-mn113:16-20.13_0: if they practice in line with the teaching, practice properly, and live in line with the teaching, they are worthy of honor and praise for that.’
ai-mn113:16-20.14_0: Keeping only the practice close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their eating in one sitting per day.
ai-mn113:16-20.15_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:21.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-mn113:21.3_0: ‘I have attained the first absorption, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:21.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:21.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:21.7_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of not identifying even with the attainment of the first absorption.
ai-mn113:21.8_0: For whatever they think it is, it turns out to be something else.’
ai-mn113:21.9_0: Keping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the first absorption.
ai-mn113:21.10_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:22-24.1_0: Furthermore, as the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, they enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-mn113:22-24.3_0: dwells having attained the fourth absorption.
ai-mn113:22-24.5_0: ‘I have attained the fourth absorption, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:22-24.6_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:22-24.7_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:22-24.9_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of not identifying even with the attainment of the fourth absorption.
ai-mn113:22-24.10_0: For whatever they think it is, it turns out to be something else.’
ai-mn113:22-24.11_0: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the fourth absorption.
ai-mn113:22-24.12_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:25.1_0: Furthermore, take someone who, going totally beyond perceptions of form, with the ending of perceptions of impingement, not focusing on perceptions of diversity, aware that ‘space is infinite’, enters and remains in the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-mn113:25.3_0: ‘I have attained the attainment of the dimension of infinite space, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:25.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:25.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:25.7_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of not identifying even with the attainment of the dimension of infinite space.
ai-mn113:25.8_0: For whatever they think it is, it turns out to be something else.’
ai-mn113:25.9_0: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the dimension of infinite space.
ai-mn113:25.10_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:26.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who, going totally beyond the dimension of infinite space, aware that ‘consciousness is infinite’, enters and remains in the dimension of infinite consciousness.
ai-mn113:26.3_0: ‘I have attained the dimension of infinite consciousness ...
ai-mn113:26.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:26.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:26.7_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of not identifying even with the attainment of the dimension of infinite consciousness.
ai-mn113:26.8_0: For whatever they think it is, it turns out to be something else.’
ai-mn113:26.9_0: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the dimension of infinite consciousness.
ai-mn113:26.10_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:27.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who, going totally beyond the dimension of infinite consciousness, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, enters and remains in the dimension of nothingness.
ai-mn113:27.3_0: ‘I have gained the dimension of nothingness, but these other mendicants don’t get material possessions.’
ai-mn113:27.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:27.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:27.7_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of not identifying even with the attainment of the dimension of nothingness.
ai-mn113:27.8_0: For whatever they think it is, it turns out to be something else.’
ai-mn113:27.9_0: Keeping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the dimension of nothingness.
ai-mn113:27.10_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:28.1_0: Furthermore, take a bad person who, going totally beyond the dimension of nothingness, enters and remains in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-mn113:28.3_0: ‘I have attained the attainment of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, unlike these other mendicants.’
ai-mn113:28.4_0: And they glorify themselves and put others down on account of that.
ai-mn113:28.5_0: This too is a quality of a bad person.
ai-mn113:28.7_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of not identifying even with the attainment of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-mn113:28.8_0: For whatever they think it is, it turns out to be something else.’
ai-mn113:28.9_0: Keping only non-identification close to their heart, they don’t glorify themselves and put others down on account of their attainment of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-mn113:28.10_0: This too is a quality of a good person.
ai-mn113:29.1_0: Furthermore, take a good person who, going totally beyond the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, enters and remains in the cessation of perception and feeling.
ai-mn113:29.1_1: And, having seen with wisdom, their defilements come to an end.
ai-mn113:29.2_0: This is a mendicant who does not identify with anything, does not identify regarding anything, does not identify through anything.”
ai-mn113:29.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-mn113:29.4_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-mn113:29.5_0: The third Good Person is finished.
